## Analysis script for "

```{r load libraries}
library(readr)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggpubr)
library(rstatix)
library(stats)
library(lme4)
library(dplyr)
library(ez)
library(ltm)
library(interactions)
```


## Extract dataframe from csv file and get (mean, sd) or (mean, se) summary

```{r read csv}

setwd("C:/Users/micha/OneDrive/My_GitHub_Repos/AutonomyFitts/data/")
task_df <- read_csv("all_data.csv")

auto_levels_order <- c("low_auto", "med_auto", "high_auto")  # Replace these with your actual level names

# Reorder the factor levels of "auto_level" according to levels_order
task_df$auto_level <- factor(task_df$auto_level, levels = auto_levels_order)


######################### get mean and sd (or se) ######################### 
task_df %>%
  group_by(auto_level, ring_id) %>%
  get_summary_stats(mdmt_capable_ave, type = "mean_sd")



```

## Check assumptions

```{r check assumptions}

######################### check for outliers ######################### 
task_df %>%
  group_by(auto_level, ring_id) %>%
  identify_outliers(mdmt_capable_ave)

######################### check normality ######################### 
task_df %>%
  group_by(auto_level, ring_id) %>%
  shapiro_test(mdmt_capable_ave)

######################### plot normality ######################### 
ggqqplot(task_df, "mdmt_capable_ave", ggtheme = theme_bw()) +
  facet_grid(ring_id ~ auto_level, labeller = "label_both")


```


## Fit Model

```{r fit model}

######################### Two-way mixed ANOVA test #########################  
res.aov <- anova_test(
  data = task_df, dv = mdmt_capable_ave, wid = part_id,
  within = c(auto_level, ring_id)
  )
get_anova_table(res.aov)


#################### Effect of auto_level for each ring_id #################### 
one.way <- task_df %>%
  group_by(ring_id) %>%
  anova_test(dv = mdmt_capable_ave, wid = part_id, within = auto_level) %>%
  get_anova_table() %>%
  adjust_pvalue(method = "bonferroni")
one.way

#################### Effect of ring_id for each auto_level #################### 
one.way <- task_df %>%
  group_by(auto_level) %>%
  anova_test(dv = mdmt_capable_ave, wid = part_id, within = ring_id) %>%
  get_anova_table() %>%
  adjust_pvalue(method = "bonferroni")
one.way


#################### Pairwise comparisons between auto_level groups #################### 
pwc <- task_df %>%
  group_by(ring_id) %>%
  pairwise_t_test(
    mdmt_capable_ave ~ auto_level, paired = TRUE,
    p.adjust.method = "bonferroni"
    )
pwc

#################### Pairwise comparisons between auto_level groups #################### 
pwc <- task_df %>%
  group_by(auto_level) %>%
  pairwise_t_test(
    mdmt_capable_ave ~ ring_id, paired = TRUE,
    p.adjust.method = "bonferroni"
    )
pwc

```


## Fit Linear Model

```{r fit model}

###### fit linear mixed model 1 ######
model <- lmer(mdmt_capable_ave ~ auto_num * fitts_id_num + (1 | part_id),
              data = task_df)
summary(model)

interact_plot(model, pred = fitts_id_num, modx = auto_num, interval = TRUE, int.width = 0.8)
# interact_plot(model, pred = fitts_id_num, modx = auto_num, plot.points = TRUE, interval = TRUE, int.width = 0.8)

interact_plot(model, pred = auto_num, modx = fitts_id_num, interval = TRUE, int.width = 0.8)


```
